other_title: サクラ大戦 ニューヨーク・紐育
opening_theme: "Chijo no Senshi (地上の戦士; Warriors of the Earth)" by Sanae Kobayashi, Junko Minagawa, Ayaka Saito, Kaya Masutani, and Mie Sonozaki
ending_theme: #1: "Taboo (タブー)" by Kaya Masutani and Hisayoshi Suganuma (eps 1-2)
#2: "Dawn (夜明け)" by Kaya Masutani and Ayaka Saito (eps 3-4)
#3: "Powazon (ポワゾン)"  by Weinberg Sagiitta and Kujou Subaru (eps 5-6)
